EmailTemplate.description: Email to host to notify that their application has been received. India fellows.
EmailTemplate.name: Host Application Received - India
EmailTemplate.subject: Climate Corps Application Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Climate_Corps_Engagement__c.Respondent_Name__c},
Thank you for submitting an application for Climate Corps! We will be in touch soon.
We've attached a copy of your completed application for your records.
Best,
Paridhi Mishra
Project Advisor, Climate Corps India
pmishra@edf.org
